text: Abana or ABANA may refer to: ;Places * Abana, Kastamonu, a district of Kastamonu Province, Turkey * Barada River, a river near Damascus identified as Abana in the Bible ;Other * Abana (barque), a ship wrecked at Blackpool in 1894 * Abana (leafhopper), a genus of sharpshooter (insect) * Artist- Blacksmith's Association of North America, a trade association * Abana Ba Nasery, a defunct Kenyan band ==People with the surname Abana== * Hisseine Abana, Chadian footballer * Steve Abana (born 1969), Solomon Islands politician
title: Abana
